```{r}
#| label = "DataName.lm"
DataName.lm = lm(ResponseName~BlockingName+FactorName, data = DataName)
DataName.lm |> anova()
```


```{r}
#| label = "plotDataName.lm",
#| fig.cap = "Residual analysis for DataName.lm"
library(ggfortify)
DataName.lm |> autoplot()
```


```{GetMeans}
library(emmeans)
emmeans(DataName.lm, pairwise ~FactorName)
```
